text: geuttae du yeoin jung-ui han yeoin i sujub-eohamyeo moseegelo dagawamalhagil jeoui abeojikkeseo dangsin-eul chodaehayeo jeohuileul wihayeo yang-ege mul-eul meog-yeojun eunhyee bodabhalyeo haobnida geulaeseo geuneun geu yeoseong-ui abeoji egelo ga iyagileul hayeossdeoni geu yeoseong-ui abeojiga malhayeossdeola dulyeo wohaji masiyo dangsin-eun saaghan baeg seongdeullobuteo gujedoeeossseubnida
